bibl.title: Lantern Slides on Yellow Fever organized by Elizabeth Peabody, [1940?]

div1.p: The list of Peabody's slides includes six major topics: historical background, the yellow fever experiments in Cuba, results of the yellow fever experiments, later history of the yellow fever heroes, the yellow fever bill, and the Walter Reed Memorial in Indianapolis.
